item.description:
For info click here

This is the Thursday Night Wine Cash Bar. All wines are purchased by the glass, flights or bottle. All food items are purchased a la carte. Please maintain your own tab!

Wine Bar Hours: 5-9 PM (Since this is a gourmet affair, we will be leaving for more drinks and appetizers @ Asgard Irish Pub on Mass Ave around 7:30PM)

Did someone say Swiss Beer?

Did someone sat Swiss Wine?

Did someone say cheese, and chocolates?

Did someone say Zopf? What is that anyway? Let's go find out!

Free Parking on Mass Ave and Albany Street after 6PM. Metered parking before 6PM.
Between Kendall/MIT and Central Square on the Redline. Get off at Central Square and walk on Mass Ave toward MIT & Boston. Near across from Smart Street (near the corner of Albany Street)
item.name: All things Swiss: Beer, Wine, Cheeses and Zopf! (near Asgard Pub- Central Sq)
